hero.title: Privacy Protocol Harpo ZK
hero.infrastructure: Our infrastructure adapts to various scenarios, including data protection with operational transparency

features.title: Data Blindage with Cryptographic Proofs
features.subtitle: Silent authentication and traceability without public exposure.

items.title: UTXO
items.description: Used to represent assets between parties of a negotiation, in conditions of being transacted by the receiver through proof of ownership.

items.title: ZKP Proofs
items.description: Allow parties to prove to contracts the possession of certain information, without revealing the information itself.

items.title: Asymmetric keys
items.description: Used to enable information encryption and ensure that only the intended recipient can read it.

items.title: Hash tree
items.description: Used to verify the existence of commitments associated with UTXOs and ensure that information is received without damage, alterations or fraud.

items.title: Hashing
items.description: A resource applied in the production of commitments to be registered by the EVM, ensuring their authenticity and integrity, while preventing reversions to original data.

items.title: Nullifiers
items.description: Used to authorize UTXO expenditures, representing them in an unlinkable manner from commitments, to prevent navigation between transactions.
